name: VEVOR Electric Hoist 1760lbs with 14ft Wired Remote Control, Electric Hoist 110 Volt with 40ft Single Cable Lifting Height Motor, for Garage Warehouse Factory
short_description: 14ft Wired Remote Control: The electric hoist with 14ft handle remote cord is designed to meet your needs for lifting items over long distances. You can lift your items more easily and securely without having to extend the length of the handle cord yourself or use other tools. It comes with 4 security features：emergency stop button, limit switch, auto brake, and anti-spin rope — to ensure secure operation

Two Modes of Operation: The electric hoist are equipped with braided steel cable for added stability and load capacity. Two options are offered to lift items: Single line lift: 880 lbs at 32 ft/min, max height: 39.4 ft; Double line lift: 1760 lbs at 16 ft/min, max height: 19.7 ft

Powerful Motor: The high-quality motor provides 1450W of strong power, which can withstand large forces without causing deformation of the electric winch. In addition, the large cooling fan can quickly cool the machine to avoid overheating. Therefore, this powerful motor ensures efficient operation and saves you more time and energy

Built to Last: The electric hoist features a durable steel body that resists deformation, comes with a 19-strand thickened steel wire rope and high-strength metal hook—ensuring secure, stable lifting without breakage or wear, ideal for long-term use

Convenient to Install: You can easily hang the electric wire hoist on a ceiling or beam using the mounting brackets—installation takes just two effortless steps.It comes with a 13ft lifting sling strap and a 3.2ft shaft belt with metal ring.You can widely used in garages, factories, warehouses and families, as well as professionals and amateurs
